thread.title: Keisean Nixon on big kickoff returns: 'I think it swings momentum'
thread.title_full: Keisean Nixon on big kickoff returns: 'I think it swings momentum'

title: Keisean Nixon on big kickoff returns: 'I think it swings momentum'
text: Locker Room Interviews Keisean Nixon on big kickoff returns: 'I think it swings momentum' Green Bay Packers CB Keisean Nixon discusses how a big kick return can change the game for a team. Latest Videos [ video ](/video/joe-barry-on-corey-ballentine-he-was-a-stud-for-us-on-sunday-in-minnesota) Joe Barry on Corey Ballentine: 'He was a stud for us on Sunday in Minnesota' Jan 04, 2024 Defensive coordinator Joe Barry spoke to the media on Thursday as the Green Bay Packers prepare for a Week 18 matchup with the Chicago Bears. [ video ](/video/rich-bisaccia-i-think-we-are-making-progress-every-day-with-him) Rich Bisaccia: 'I think we are making progress every day with him' Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers special teams coordinator Rich Bisaccia talks about the mental toughness of K Anders Carlson. [ video ](/video/bo-melton-it-s-playoff-time-win-and-advance-2023) Bo Melton: 'It's playoff time, win and advance' Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers WR Bo Melton spoke to the media on Thursday about being activated to the 53-man roster and his performance against the Vikings last week. [ video ](/video/luke-musgrave-i-want-to-play-week-18-2023) Luke Musgrave: 'I want to play' Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers TE Luke Musgrave talks about the possibility of playing in Sunday afternoon's matchup against the Chicago Bears at Lambeau Field. [ video ](/video/elgton-jenkins-we-got-to-keep-moving-forward-and-keep-building) Elgton Jenkins: 'We got to keep moving forward and keep building' Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers G/T Elgton Jenkins talks about the recent success of the offensive line as a group. [ video ](/video/aj-dillon-we-have-a-lot-to-play-for) AJ Dillon: 'We have a lot to play for' Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers RB AJ Dillon spoke with the media ahead of Sunday's home matchup with the Chicago Bears. [ video ](/video/matt-lafleur-excited-for-team-to-experience-playoff-type-vibe-at-lambeau-field) Matt LaFleur excited for team to experience 'playoff-type vibe' at Lambeau Field Jan 04, 2024 Green Bay Packers Head Coach Matt LaFleur spoke to the media ahead of the Week 18 home matchup against the Chicago Bears. [ video ](/video/packers-daily-decade-of-dominance-2023) Packers Daily: Decade of dominance Jan 04, 2024 Wayne Larrivee takes a look back at the recent rivalry between Green Bay and Chicago in this edition of Packers Daily. [ video ](/video/packers-unscripted-here-comes-chicago-2023) Packers Unscripted: Here comes Chicago Jan 04, 2024 Mike and Wes preview the matchup with the Bears, looking at QB Justin Fields and their offense (3:54) as well as their much-improved defense (7:19). They also examine the Packers' keys to victory on both sides of the ball (12:12, 16:43), the Pro Bowl selections (19:35), and the NFC playoff picture (23:00). They also examine the Packers' keys to victory on both sides of the ball (12:12, 16:43), the Pro Bowl selections (19:35), and the NFC playoff picture (23:00).
